name: Typical HiveNightmare SAM File Export
description: Detects files written by the different tools that exploit HiveNightmare
false_positives: Files that accidentally contain these strings
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:(*\\hive_sam_* OR *\\SAM\-2021\-* OR *\\SAM\-2022\-* OR *\\SAM\-2023\-* OR *\\SAM\-haxx* OR *\\Sam.save*) OR file.path:C\:\\windows\\temp\\sam)`
